name: Inner Hellfire
description:
Warning: This game contains mature themes such as cheating, implied murder,  sexual themes, strong language, and fluffy demons. Viewer discretion is advised.

After Lucia is cheated on by her boyfriend Grayson for the final time her friend group bands together to get payback. What was once harmless revenge quickly turns the night demonic and deadly, and the girls soon find themselves in over their heads.

Inner Hellfire is our submission to the Spookotber VN jam this year.  It is closer to a kinetic novel than a visual novel with only a handful of choices.  It's a  short, devilish game with only about 30 minutes of playtime.

Ram._Mawz: Writing & Character Sprites

Zakiyah L. Williams: Writing

Nequi:  Custom UI

Rat Creature In My Basement: Editor

KiChanVA: Lucia's VA

Joseph Bozlinski: Ari's VA

JemAbsolute: Zelda's VA

Soleil Lin: Aries'  VA

LynnVA: Alpha's VA

Note:  Custom UI was created but we ran out of time to implement it.  Premade UI will be used for the judging period, and the custom UI will be updated after.

UI:   https://novelkit.itch.io/rounded-gui-kit
